# Direction: 0 = Right; 1 = Left, null = Idle

[ANIMATION_SETS]
# Mario
1	100	1000	1060	1010	1020	1023	1030	101	1001	1061	1011	1021	1024	1031
1	110	1100	1160	1110	1120	1123	1130	1140	111	1101	1161	1111	1121	1124	1131	1141
1	120	1200	1260	1210	1220	1223	1230	1240	121	1201	1261	1211	1221	1224	1231	1241
1	130	1300	1360	1310	1320	1323	1330	1340	131	1301	1361	1311	1321	1324	1331	1341	1099
1	10500	10510	10530	10570	10501	10511	10531	10571
